featuresSection.heading: Discover Ideal Residential Apartment Configurations in Sector 67 Gurugram
description: Sector 67 offers a diverse portfolio of residential flats designed to maximize space and natural light. Our listings include apartments from established builders known for quality construction and timely delivery. Review the popular size categories below to determine which configuration best suits your lifestyle and financial goals.

From compact homes perfect for young professionals to sprawling residences for extended families, every Flat For Sale in sector 67 has been vetted for quality and legal compliance. Finding the right layout is the first step toward securing your perfect home in this booming Gurugram locale.

features.title: 1 BHK Compact Living
features.description: Ideal for singles, young couples, or investors seeking high rental yield. These units offer smart design maximizing usable space while providing access to all community amenities. A fantastic entry point into the Sector 67 property market.

features.title: 2 BHK Ready-to-Move Flats
features.description: The most sought-after size offering a balance of space and affordability. Perfect for nuclear families, these flats usually feature two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a spacious balcony, providing comfort and utility for daily life.

features.title: 3 BHK Spacious Apartments
features.description: Designed for growing families needing extra room. These properties boast larger living areas, dedicated dining spaces, and superior fittings. Many 3 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 67 come equipped with modular kitchens and servant quarters.

features.title: 3 BHK plus Study Options
features.description: A flexible layout catering to modern work-from-home needs or providing a dedicated space for children’s education. This configuration provides that essential extra room without the cost jump of a full 4 BHK unit.

features.title: 4 BHK Luxury Residences
features.description: Premium living spaces offering expansive floor plans, high-end specifications, and often superior views. These flats are ideal for large or joint families who prioritize privacy, luxury, and ample square footage in Sector 67 Gurugram.

features.title: Penthouse and Duplex Units
features.description: The epitome of luxury living within Sector 67. These exclusive units feature double-height ceilings, private terraces, and personalized amenities, offering an unmatched residential experience in Gurugram’s skyline.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a Flat in Sector 67 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common inquiries regarding property investment, financing, and lifestyle in Sector 67.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a Flat For Sale in sector 67
faqs.answer: The price range for flats in Sector 67 varies significantly based on configuration, builder reputation, age of construction, and specific amenities offered within the society. Generally, a compact 1 BHK unit might start from approximately 30 Lakhs, while a standard 3 BHK apartment in a premium society can range between 65 Lakhs and 1 Crore or more. We highly recommend reviewing our up-to-date listings and contacting us for the precise pricing of the specific property type you are interested in.

faqs.question: Is Sector 67 considered a good long-term investment location in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Sector 67 is strategically positioned near the Greater Gurugram area which is the focus of rapid development and infrastructure upgrades. Its proximity to the main highways and commercial nodes ensures consistent demand, both from homebuyers and renters. The robust planned development surrounding the sector suggests high potential for capital appreciation over the next five to ten years making it an excellent long-term investment choice.

faqs.question: Are most flats in Sector 67 RERA registered and verified
faqs.answer: We prioritize listing properties that are RERA compliant, especially for new and under-construction projects. RERA registration ensures that the project adheres to strict regulatory guidelines regarding delivery timelines, quality standards, and financial transparency. When considering a Flat For Sale in sector 67, always verify the project’s RERA ID. Our team assists clients with this verification process to guarantee a secure transaction.

faqs.question: What types of amenities are commonly available in Sector 67 residential societies
faqs.answer: Residential societies in Sector 67 typically offer a comprehensive suite of modern amenities designed for comfort and luxury. Standard facilities often include clubhouses, dedicated children's play areas, swimming pools, state-of-the-art gymnasiums, power backup, high-speed elevators, jogging tracks, and multi-level parking. Premium societies may also feature internal convenience stores and sports facilities like tennis or basketball courts.

faqs.question: What are the common options for home loan financing in Sector 67
faqs.answer: Since Sector 67 is a well-established and growing residential hub, almost all major public and private sector banks and Non-Banking Financial Companies NBFCs offer competitive home loan products for properties here. Banks typically look for RERA-approved properties and clean titles. We can connect you with trusted financial advisors who specialize in securing favorable loan terms for flats in Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 67 well-connected to the Delhi Metro network
faqs.answer: While Sector 67 is not directly adjacent to an operational Metro station, it enjoys excellent feeder connectivity. The nearest operational Metro stations like Bata Chowk or Escorts Mujesar are easily reachable via a short drive or public transport. Future development plans indicate enhanced transport links, further reducing commute times into Delhi and improving the overall connectivity of the area.

faqs.question: What is the typical age of the residential construction in Sector 67
faqs.answer: Sector 67 is one of the newer development zones in Greater Gurugram, meaning a significant portion of the inventory consists of relatively new or recently completed projects, typically less than 10 years old. There is also a substantial inventory of brand-new, ready-to-move-in flats and those still under construction, offering buyers the choice between immediate occupancy and potential pre-launch savings.

faqs.question: Are there good schools and hospitals near Sector 67
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 67 benefits from an excellent social infrastructure. Reputable educational institutions such as DPS and other CBSE-affiliated schools are located within a short radius. Similarly, renowned hospitals and multispecialty clinics are easily accessible, ensuring high-quality education and healthcare are conveniently close for residents.

faqs.question: What are the maintenance costs like for flats in this area
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges in Sector 67 societies generally depend on the level of amenities provided and the density of the complex. For a standard 3 BHK flat, monthly maintenance fees can range from 3,000 INR to 6,000 INR. This typically covers security, common area lighting, lift maintenance, sanitation, and shared amenity upkeep. Detailed maintenance breakdown is always provided transparently before purchase.

faqs.question: Can I find ready-to-move flats or only under-construction projects in Sector 67
faqs.answer: You can find a healthy mix of both ready-to-move RTM and under-construction UC projects in Sector 67. Ready-to-move flats are popular for those needing immediate occupancy or rental income, while under-construction properties often offer more attractive pricing and installment payment options. Our listings clearly categorize the status of every Flat For Sale in sector 67.
